metadata.title: CVE-2020-17497 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description:
eapol.c in iNet wireless daemon (IWD) through 1.8 allows attackers to trigger a PTK reinstallation by retransmitting EAPOL Msg4/4.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-17497` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

iwd - 1.9-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: iwd package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.9-2').
